title: Fragments, 1780–90
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
markings: Two blue warps at each selvedge.
dimensions:
A. Warp: 35cm (13 3/4in.). Weft: 69cm (27 1/4in.).
B. Warp: 35cm (13 3/4in.). Weft: 69cm (27 1/4in.).
C. Warp: 34.5cm (13 1/2in.). Weft; 56cm (22in.)
A and B are both selvedge to selvedge; C has left selvedge only.
description:
Three fragments which when put together do not give the full height of the repeat. 
A double gabled thatched farmhouse house in front of a farmyard, people haying and in the distance a fox hunt. 
in red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 1780–90.
1780–90. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-113-a/c.
